title: Italian Chicken With Pepper
ingredients: Freshly-ground black pepper to taste, 2 mediums tomatoes, diced (or 1 can), 1 frying chicken skinless,, 1 teaspoon Dried Basil, 2 garlic cloves peeled, minced, 1 medium green bell pepper stemmed, cored,, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 onion, chopped, Crushed red pepper flakes to taste, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon Salt
instructions:
1. In a 2 1/2-quart pressure frypan or larger pressure cooker, heat oil over high heat. Add chicken and cook until browned on all sides. Remove from pan and set aside.
  2. Add onion, green bell pepper and garlic. Cook until softened. Add red wine vinegar to pan and stir to loosen any brown bits that may be sticking. Add chicken, tomatoes, basil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper.
  3. Close lid and bring pressure to second red ring (15 pounds pressure) over high heat. Adjust heat to stabilize pressure at second red ring. Cook for 10 minutes.
  4. Remove from heat and use Natural Release Method.
  5. Arrange chicken on a warm platter and cover with vegetables and sauce.
  6. This recipe yields 4 servings.
  7. Comments: The vegetables and sauce are delicious served over polenta for a complete Italian meal. Prego!
usedIngredients: 2 mediums tomatoes, diced (or 1 can), 1 frying chicken skinless,, 2 garlic cloves peeled, minced
missedIngredients: 1 teaspoon Dried Basil, 1 medium green bell pepper stemmed, cored,, 1 onion, chopped, Crushed red pepper flakes to taste, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar

title: Cranberry Apple Crisp
ingredients: 4 cups Granny Smith apples, chopped into ½ inch chunks, 2 cups fresh cranberries, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 stick (4 Tbs) unsalted butter, cut into cubes, 1 1/2 cups regular oats (not quick-cooking), 1/2 cup light brown sugar, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1 stick unsalted butter, melted
instructions:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees and grease or butter a 913 glass baking dish.
In a large bowl, toss together the chopped apples, cranberries and sugar. Let stand for a few minutes then pour into the baking dish.
Dot the mixture with the 1/2 stick of cubed butter.
In a medium bowl, combine the oats, brown sugar and flour.  Sprinkle evenly over the cranberries and apples in the baking dish.  Gently pour the melted butter over the top.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes.  Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the oat topping is nicely browned.
Serve warm as a side or for dessert with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
usedIngredients: 4 cups Granny Smith apples, chopped into ½ inch chunks
missedIngredients: 2 cups fresh cranberries, 1/2 stick (4 Tbs) unsalted butter, cut into cubes, 1 1/2 cups regular oats (not quick-cooking)

title: White Chocolate Apricot Bread
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups Bread Flour, 2 teaspoons Yeast, active dry, instant or bread machine, cup White Chocolate Morsels, 6 ounces Dried apricots halved, 1 Egg, large, at room temp, 1 tablespoon Granulated sugar, 3/4 cup Milk, 1/2 teaspoon Salt, 4 Tbsp. cold unsalted butter
instructions:
1. Note: instructions are for the Cuisinart Breadmaker, I assume all bread makers pretty much run the same.
  2. From Milk to Yeast, place ingredients, in order listed, in the bread pan fitted with the kneading paddle.
  3. Place the bread pan in the breadmaker.
  4. Select settings as follows: White bread cycle, 1lb loaf, light crust (or as desired) and make sure the mix in signal is selected. This will indicate when to add the apricots and chocolate.
  5. Press start.
  6. When the mix-in signal sounds (this is in the middle of the long kneading cycle), pause the machine and add the apricots and chocolate. (I actually take the dough out and try to put the apricots and chocolate inside so it gets nice and mixed through).
  7. Place pan back in bread machine and continue (unpause) and let the machine finish the job.
  8. Let cool for 20-30 minutes before slicing.
usedIngredients: 3/4 cup Milk, 4 Tbsp. cold unsalted butter
missedIngredients: 2 1/2 cups Bread Flour, 2 teaspoons Yeast, active dry, instant or bread machine, cup White Chocolate Morsels, 6 ounces Dried apricots halved, 1 Egg, large, at room temp
